title: Scrubber Parameters
description: Factors that control the behavior of a Java class that removes private parts of a data object before the object is shared

removeDates.comments: When true, remove all date fields from output
removeDates.title: Remove Date

deidentifyAuditUser.comments: When true, remove users listed as creator or modifier of records and subrecords
deidentifyAuditUser.title: Deidentify Audit User

removeAllLocked.comments: When true, remove any data element that is marked as non-public
removeAllLocked.title: Remove all Locked

accessGroupsToInclude.comments: names of access groups to that will NOT be removed
accessGroupsToInclude.title: Access Groups to Include

removeElementsIfNoExportablePublicRef.comments: elements to remove when they have no public references
removeElementsIfNoExportablePublicRef.title: Remove Elements if no exportable selected public domain reference

elementsToRemove.comments: elements to remove when the substance has no public references
elementsToRemove.title: Elements to remove

removeCodesBySystem.comments: When true, remove any Codes whose CodeSystem is on the list
removeCodesBySystem.title: Remove Codes by System

removeReferencesByCriteria.comments: When true, remove any References that meet specified criteria
removeReferencesByCriteria.title: Remove References by Criteria

referenceTypesToRemove.comments: Document Types to look at. When a Reference is of that document type, remove it
referenceTypesToRemove.title: Reference Types to Remove

citationPatternsToRemove.comments: Patterns (RegExes) to apply to Reference citation.  When a citation matches, remove the Reference
citationPatternsToRemove.title: Citation Patterns to Remove

excludeReferenceByPattern.comments: Remove References by looking at citationPatternsToRemove
excludeReferenceByPattern.title: Exclude Reference by Pattern

substanceReferenceCleanup.comments: When true, next criteria are used to process substance references
substanceReferenceCleanup.title: Substance Reference Cleanup

removeReferencesToFilteredSubstances.comments: When true, when a substance is removed, remove any references to it
removeReferencesToFilteredSubstances.title: Remove References to Filtered Substances

removeReferencesToSubstancesNonExportedD.comments: When true, when a substance's definition is removed, remove any references to it
removeReferencesToSubstancesNonExportedD.title: Remove References to Substances Non-Exported Definitions

removeChangeReason.comments: When true, delete the 'Change Reason' field
removeChangeReason.title: Remove Change Reason

approvalIdCleanup.comments: When true, apply additional criteria to the approvalID field
approvalIdCleanup.title: Approval Id clean-up

removeApprovalId.comments: When true, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is removed
removeApprovalId.title: Remove Approval Id

copyApprovalIdToCode.comments: When true, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is copied to a code
copyApprovalIdToCode.title: Copy Approval Id to code if code not already present

approvalIdCodeSystem.comments: When this parameter has a value, the record's approval ID (system-generated identifier created when the substance is verified by a second registrar) is copied to a code of this specified system
approvalIdCodeSystem.title: Remove Approval Id

regenerateUUIDs.comments: When true, all UUIDs in the object being exported will be given a newly-generated value
regenerateUUIDs.title: Regenerate UUIDs

changeAllStatuses.comments: When true, all status value in the object being exported will be given a value
changeAllStatuses.title: Change All Statuses

newStatusValue.comments: new string value to assign to all individual status fields throughout the object
newStatusValue.title: New Status Value

AuditInformationCleanup.comments: When true, apply succeeding criteria to audit fields
AuditInformationCleanup.title: Audit Information clean-up

newAuditorValue.comments: new string value to assign to all auditor (creator/modifier) fields throughout the object
newAuditorValue.title: New Auditor Value

scrubbedDefinitionHandling.comments: apply some additional scrubbing to definitions that had parts removed
scrubbedDefinitionHandling.title: Scrubbed Definition Handling

removeScrubbedDefinitionalElementsEntire.comments: When a defining element has been modified, remove it entirely
removeScrubbedDefinitionalElementsEntire.title: Remove partially/fully scrubbed definitional records entirely

setScrubbedDefinitionalElementsIncomplet.comments: When a defining element has been modified, set definitional level to "Incomplete"
setScrubbedDefinitionalElementsIncomplet.title: Set partially/fully scrubbed definitional records to definitional level "Incomplete"

convertScrubbedDefinitionsToConcepts.comments: When a substance's defining element has been modified, convert the substance type to "Concept"
convertScrubbedDefinitionsToConcepts.title: Convert partially/fully scrubbed definitional records to "Concepts"

addNoteToScrubbedDefinitions.comments: When a substance's defining element has been modified, add a Note
addNoteToScrubbedDefinitions.title: add a note to partially/fully scrubbed definitional records
